text: (Viruntinaraka vanta vanavarkal) kurinarkal; "meyyakave nam um'mutaiya iraivanin tutarkalakave irukkinrom; niccayamaka avarkal um'mai vantataiya mutiyatu; enave iravin oru pakuti irukkumpote um kutumpattutan (ivvurai vittuc) cenruvitum! Um'mutaiya manaiviyait tavira, unkalil yarum tirumpiyum parkka ventam. Niccayamaka avarkalukku varakkutiya apattu avalaiyum pitittuk kollum. (Vetanai vara) avarkalukku niccayamaka vakkalikkappatta neram vitiyarkalaiyakum; vitiyarkalai camipittu vitavillaiya
